src:
Arsenal Pecat 8 Staf Era Arsene Wenger, Ada Apa?
05 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal melakukan pemecatan. Tetapi, bukan Unai Emery yang dipecat. Klub asal London Utara tersebut baru saja memecat delapan staff belakang layar klub. Staf ini sudah bekerja sejak era Arsene Wenger.
Arsenal pernah menjadi 'penguasa' di Arsenal. Pria asal Prancis tersebut menjadi manajer untuk The Gunners untuk durasi yang sangat lama. Lebih dari seperempat abad Wenger memegang jabatan manajer Arsenal.
Wenger menjadi manajer pada era Tony Adams, Thierry Henry, Cesc Fabregas, hingga Hector Bellerin. Wenger menjadi manajer saat Arsenal masih bermarkas di Higbury hingga pindah ke Stadion Emirates.
Imperium Arsene Wenger di London Utara baru berakhir pada 2018 lalu. Berakhirnya era Wenger tidak lantas membuat nuansa Wenger hilang begitu saja di Arsenal. Masih banyak orang-orang Wenger yang bekerja di sana.
text:
Arsenal Fire 8 Staff Era Arsene Wenger, What's Up?
05 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal fired. But it wasn't Unai Emery who was fired. The North London club has just fired eight staff behind the scenes of the club. This staff has worked since the era of Arsene Wenger.
Arsenal was once the 'ruler' at Arsenal. The man from France became a manager for the Gunners for a very long duration. More than a quarter of a century Wenger held the post of manager of Arsenal.
Wenger became a manager in the era of Tony Adams, Thierry Henry, Cesc Fabregas, to Hector Bellerin. Wenger became manager when Arsenal was still headquartered in Higbury to move to the Emirates Stadium.
Arsene Wenger's empire in North London only ended in 2018. The end of the Wenger era did not necessarily make the nuances of Wenger just disappear at Arsenal. There are still many Wenger people who work there.
